timeline.title: WWS initiated by Leo
passages: To support Haachama the World Wide Support for SAIKYO Idol group was founded.
The goal was to show Haachama that fans from all over the world support her.
Haachama should know she is never alone.

timeline.title: Sakazuki joins WWS
passages: To support Leo with his idea Sakazuki joined the WWS team as a staff member.
He is working on graphics and also the contact person for JP Haatons.

timeline.title: Haachama hiatus
passages: As a result of new rules Haachama had to private videos of her Haachama x Haato series
and announced later that she is taking a break for a while.

timeline.title: M.A.S.S. Collab
passages: The WWS team reached out to the Manotomo Alliance Support Squad discord server.
It is known for helping with various fan support projects.
The collab consisted of gathering fan messages and portraying them on a website.

timeline.title: Zhadar joins WWS
passages: In order to represent WWS on social media Zhadar joined the team.
He is also working on the overall coordination of the projects.

timeline.title: Website launch
passages: The website for the gathered fan messages and pictures was launched.

timeline.title: Abner joins WWS
passages: To help with final touches on the project video Abner joined the staff team.
Since then he has been the head of the graphic team.

timeline.title: Steve joins WWS
passages: As a means to assist Abner on the video Steve joined the staff team.
Besides his work on graphics he is supervising the WWS discord server.

timeline.title: Haachama World Wide Tourguide
passages: The first project was completed and the video uploaded on youtube.
In total we received photos from more than 450 Haatons from all over the world.
46 different countries were represented in this fan project.
(The video was later reuploaded on the official WWS youtube channel)

timeline.title: WWS Discord
passages: As a convenient way to coordinate projects better in the future
the WWS Discord server was created.
Until the start of the second project it remained closed.
During the peak of the following project 470 members joined the server.

timeline.title: Athy joins WWS
passages: Athy (Athena Nightingale) joined the WWS staff team as an expert for music.
She has led the chorus & instrumental teams and was participating
in the song as one of the two main lead singers.

timeline.title: 2nd project: Grand Birthday Chorus
passages: On this day the new project opened up to the public.
Everyone who was interested in supporting Haachama could work
for the project and join the discord server.
There were the following teams:
illustrators, animators, chorus, instrumentalists, songwriter and translators

timeline.title: WWS youtube channel
passages: The WWS team opened up their own official youtube
channel to present all projects properly.

timeline.title: Haato’s Birthday Parade♥
passages: On Haachamas birthday the WWS group released the finished project video.
It was uploaded on youtube and posted on twitter with Haachamas hashtags.
Later Haachama had a cooking stream and tried to make her own cake.
During her stream she showed the birthday project video three times.
She was overwhelmed by this gift and very thankful

timeline.title: WWS project server on break
passages: After the birthday project was over the WWS discord server went on a break.
Everyone could stay and wait for the next project announcement in 2022.

timeline.title: Shoutout from Haachama
passages: For Haachamas #photochama stream the WWS team decided to enter
the contest with the World Wide Tourguide project of 2021.
It was suspected that Haachama didn’t see it before when the WWS group was still unknown.
Haachama showed the first project video at the end of her stream.
Furthermore she asked Haatons to support the WWS fangroup
and revealed that she is subscribed on youtube.
